channel.title: How do i make a server?
channel.description: How do i make a server? Someone told me that you use the number 127.0.0.1 that appears when you start to login on the webclient and you edit and add things on that and rename it but i try to log in and it wont let me. help?? :confused:

item.title: How do i make a server?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

OK Then, click here for an excellent guide on how to make a server/project. It will be tough though, honestly it takes hard work to make and host a server.

I wish you good luck though.

Read full topic
